name: Subway Idle
description:
Metro Idle, the idle subway simulator!

Metro Idle is all about upgrading and maintaining a subway map for a growing city. Upgrade and connect stations between other stations and get your trains running. As new stations open, earn more money and upgrade your metro even further! Decide where to use your limited cash flow. Be sure to keep your city moving.

• Multiple cities to progress through!
• Earn while your offline to advance your metro!
• Tons of upgrades to advance your network.

-------------------------------

Cancelling a trial or a subscription:
If you want to cancel a subscription during its free trial, you have to cancel it through your account in the Store. This must be done at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period to avoid being charged.
